SELECT t.cid, t.uid, t1.uname, t.cname, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(t.`start`,'%Y/%m/%d'),' - ',DATE_FORMAT(t.`end`,'%Y/%m/%d')) as delivery_time FROM campaign t,advertiser t1 where t.uid = t1.uid
and (t.cid = #{searchKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or t.cname like '%${searchKeyword}%')
and t.uid in (select uid from advertiser where agency_id = #{agencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and t.uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and ((`start` > #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `start` <= #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or (`start` <= #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `end` >= #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
order by cid desc
